description: Aspose.Words for .NET class library supports DOC, DOCX, RTF, HTML, OpenDocument, PDF, XPS, EPUB and other formats. With Aspose.Words you can generate, modify, convert, render and print documents without utilizing Microsoft Word®
releaseNotes:
There are 120 improvements and fixes in this regular monthly release. The most notable are:

• Extended public API for working with fields in the document.
• Added public API to find on which page a particular document element is laid out.
• Layout performance improved by at least 10%.
• Improvements to layout of nested objects and tables.
• Improvements to rendering of special RTL characters and content of SDT tags.
• Added support for binary OLE objects in OpenDocument (ODT) documents.
• LISTNUM, AUTONUM and similar numbering fields are supported when rendering.
• Import of SVG images in HTML is supported.
• DrawingML line caps are rendered.
• DrawingML Chart custom axis title rotation and other features are rendered.

This release introduces the new features, enhancements and fixes to the excptions/bugs as detailed below:

• New features

WORDSJAVA-599	Support in java .Net-style number formats like ",0.00".
WORDSNET-2096	Add "text:table-of-content" import/export
WORDSNET-2902	Consider exposing pagination information for document elements.
WORDSNET-2978	Consider exposing layout information of nodes.
WORDSNET-5155	Support SVG in HTML
WORDSNET-6565	img.border is ignored when loading HTML
WORDSNET-7036	Rework FORMCHECKBOX rendering.
WORDSNET-7219	Support custom axis titles rotation angle
WORDSNET-7235	Arrows inside the DML are missing in PDF
WORDSNET-7254	Provide Lockheed Martin with a feature they want (native Page Finder implementation)
WORDSNET-7352	Implement public FieldCollection
WORDSNET-7378	Provide a Warning during layout of documents with hyphenation
WORDSNET-7431	Table borders are not rendering at the very bottom edge of Page in Pdf
WORDSNET-7476	Angle of Arrow Shape is lost in output documents
WORDSNET-7503	Hanging punctuation is not applied to header
WORDSNET-7518	Provide events in the API similar to those provided by Word.Application and Word.Document classes
WORDSNET-7598	SwfSaveOptions- Add an option to prevent printing of SWF file
WORDSNET-7676	Support import of images from HTML using embed, object and iframe tags
WORDSNET-7684	Support binary OLE objects (<draw:object-ole>) in ODT
